explanation: [0-0] A man stands in front of a brick house. He is wearing a maroon top, blue shorts and a pair of white shoes. In his right hand he is holding a tennis racket and in his left hand a tennis ball. The words "Crazy tennis glitch trickshot" are written in black at the top of the screen.

[0-2] The man then raises his left arm as if to throw the tennis ball and looks at his left hand, but the ball is not thrown, at the same time he raises his right hand with the racket to catch the ball and hit it against the brick wall opposite.
